question: The best way to solve the world’s environmental problem is to increase the cost of fuel. To what extent do you AGREE OR DISAGREE with this statement?
text: There are those who hold the view that endangered species like plants and animals is the number one environmental problem in our society today. On the other hand, some think that there are more important environmental problems.

Zoophilists and botanists believe that majority of the environmental issue nowadays is the depletion of particular species of plants and animals. The reason for that is that there is not enough food to eat and places to live on. Mainly because of deforestation and turning the forest into commercial or residential districts. Arguably, trees and grass are one of the sources of their food and home. In addition, killing them illegally is included in the three top causes on why another living organism like animals is decreasing.

On the contrary, some were claiming that there are other most valuable environmental problems that needed to tackle . For example, pollution, global warming, and waste disposal are far weighed more vital in our community. In detail, air pollution has  harmful effects on an immunocompromised individual such as respiratory diseases and heart complications. Global warming can cause heatwaves, floods and droughts that are difficult for us individuals to survive. Lastly, improper waste disposal can cause  serious problems like infectious diseases, land and water pollution and loss of biodiversity loss.

In conclusion, there are several reasons to believe that endangered species should be  our top priority on the environmental problems. However, I do not hold the same view. I strongly believe that there are other more important issues in our environment that our government should focus on.
